name: Earth Rotation Shock - 10% Speed Increase
description: Simulation of a 10% increase in Earth's rotation speed and its comprehensive economic and societal impacts including day length changes, circadian disruption, agricultural productivity decline, infrastructure stress, and climate instability

metadata.notes: Models a 10% increase in Earth's rotation speed, shortening days from 24h to 21.6h. Includes comprehensive impacts on human circadian rhythms, agricultural cycles, infrastructure systems, climate patterns, and economic adaptation over 30 years.
